src:
V jami se je hudo poškodoval enajstletni deček
04 Nov 2019, 15:48 by Spletno uredništvo

Gorski in jamarski reševalci iz Trsta so včeraj posredovali v Trebčah, kjer se je v tamkajšnji jami Labadnici poškodoval enajstletni deček, sicer italijanski državljan z bivališčem v Sežani.



Včerajšnja reševalna akcija v Trebčah Foto: CNSAS FVG

TRST > Medtem ko se je spuščal v jamo z očetom in bratcem, je na globini 250 metrov padel in se močno udaril v glavo, poroča Primorski dnevnik.
Na kraj je prihitela ekipa devetnajstih reševalcev, med katerimi tudi zdravnik in dva bolničarja. Dečka so našli tik ob vhodu v jamo, kamor so ga nezavestnega uspeli prenesti oče in drugi madžarski jamarji.
Dečka je reševalno vozilo službe 118 prepeljalo v bolnišnico, kjer so zdravniki ugotovili, da je utrpel hujši pretres možganov. Na kraju so bili tudi gasilci. še dodajajo na Primorskem dnevniku.
text:
An eleven-year-old boy was seriously injured in a cave
04 Nov 2019, 15:48 by Online Editorial

Mountain and cave rescuers from Trieste yesterday intervened in Trebce, where an eleven-year-old boy, otherwise an Italian citizen residing in Sežana, was injured in Labadnica's cave there.



Yesterday's rescue operation in Trebče Photo: CNSAS FVG

TRST> While descending into a cave with his father and brother, he fell at a depth of 250 meters and hit his head hard, the Primorski daily reports.
A team of nineteen paramedics arrived, including a doctor and two paramedics. The boy was found near the entrance to the cave, where his father and other Hungarian cavemen had managed to pass him unconsciously.
The boy was transported by ambulance 118 to a hospital, where doctors determined he suffered a severe concussion. Firefighters were also on the scene. they added on the Primorska Dnevnik daily.
